sql.name: table3cablequarterlypage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: table3cablequarterly.left
table3cablequarterly.colTitle
sql.item: select trim('芯公里自建') from dual union all select trim('芯公里租用') from dual union all select trim('已用芯公里') from dual union all select trim('合计') from dual union all select trim('比例自建') from dual union all select trim('比例租用') from dual union all select trim('光纤使用率') from dual

sql.name: table3cablequarterly.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('芯公里自建'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000004),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('芯公里租用'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000005),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('已用芯公里'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000006),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('合计'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000010),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('比例自建'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000011),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('比例租用'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000012),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('光纤使用率'),t.c802000002 as 所属城市,nvl(sum(t.c802000014),0) as num from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
